html.p: The Insteon app needs to have the details regarding the individual devices in order to properly understand the messages sent to and from the device. Devices will automatically be discovered when they enter linking mode. If a device appears in the list below, press the "set" button in order to have it send it's product identification. The product data should be automatically discovered within 10 minutes.
